extendedInfo.description: Do you want to take control of your dreams and experience your wildest desires? Controlling your mind while dreaming will allow you to jump into a fantasy world where you control everything. This idea is called lucid dreaming. As a lucid dreamer you will be able to easily design and craft your own universe. However, many have found it difficult to achieve lucidity while dreaming. With Lucid Dream Ultimate you can become a lucid dreamer and fulfill all of your wildest desires.The app has 3 powerful groups of features.Day: Reality ChecksReality Checks are an important part of lucid dreaming.  Repeated reality checks will help you lucid dream. Lucid Dream Ultimate will help you perform these checks with customizable notifications and settings.Night: Dream AlarmsLucid Dream Ultimate will also assist you when you are sleeping. There are 6 methods to assist you with sound cues in your sleep to help achieve lucidity. Nap, WILD/WBTB, REM Interruption, Custom REM Interruption, Smart REM Interruption, and Motion Detection. You can also enjoy falling asleep to binaural and isochronic tones.Dream JournalRecording your dreams has been shown to increase dream recall resulting in more lucid dreams. Lucid Dream Ultimate has an easy to use dream journal with multiple features,Password ProtectionEdit and Delete functionalityExport to external storageEasy to use and navigate I can't promise that this app will make you lucid dream, but it can definitely help you get closer in many ways.Be sure to check out the help screen and watch for updates.Permissions:WakeLock for night alarms.RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETED for setting reality check after reboot.Write to Storage for exporting your dream journal.Note: The audio glitch seen in the comments is the StageFright Android bug. I am working on a workaround for it currently.Lucid Dream Ultimate Assistant with dream diary

reviews.title: Amazing!
reviews.comment: This is the best lucid dreaming app I\'ve ever used! It\'s simple to use and really effective.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: One Major Flaw
reviews.comment: I love the app\'s intention, and the Day function works fine.  The only problem is the Night function not working properly. I tried using it last night but it never went off and I even did a daytime test of the Night function but nothing happened. I\'m using a Galaxy S II and I don\'t know if that has anything to do with the functionality.
reviews.author: Noah Davis

reviews.title: Tons of potential but...
reviews.comment: Still buggy and not the most intuitive. It\'s almost there just some minor tweaks needed. Need to fix the binaural beats as that was my main reason for the app and there is a weird skip that won\'t allow it to do what it\'s supposed.... two months later and still no fix. I paid for this app and developer has done nothing in months
reviews.author: Nicholas Costa

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Works great. The people that complain about the binural beats being low, they are low frequency and if you actually read the description it says it requires headphones to be effective. Please read and understand before you complain and turn others off to this app. Works great if you don\'t assume you know everything and read!
reviews.author: Antonio Huie

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: I\'ve been using this app primarily for its reality-check reminders. Good work so far.  Perhaps, just to add to the skepticism of \"are you dreaming\" and making the user question his/her surroundings a bit more, you could add a Yes and a No button to the notification on swipe down (jellybean style)?  Thanks anyway :)
reviews.author: Mathias Barfred

reviews.title: Could be better.
reviews.comment: The click and pop sound every minute or so is extremely annoying and jarring when falling asleep. Is this a loop of sound repeating? Not good enough for a paid app.
reviews.author: LJ Boyd

reviews.title: Needs a lot of work
reviews.comment: The sound waves are so low you probably have to put head phones on while sleeping Couldn\'t hear anything when started, plus a better guide would have been better, step  by step while you program the sleep,  The sound is really too low, other binaural apps have much better volume level this app plain sucks for paid too it does not work without a guide and a proper loudness so we can determine our own sound levels.
reviews.author: Eden Sama

reviews.title: Usefull
reviews.comment: This app continuously reminds you to check to see if you a dreaming. It\'s good because it\'s hard to remember to check. BTW I think you meant hold your nose and try to breathe not hold your breath and try to breathe.
reviews.author: Chris Steele

reviews.title: Seriously Fantastic
reviews.comment: I really don\'t understand where the negative comments are coming from. This app has really helped me out. It has so many features that I use. The dream journal is top notch and the reality check reminders have helped me reality check during my dreams. The night sounds work fine for me so I\'m not sure why people are having problems.  If you\'re hesitant to buy it, don\'t be. Lucid dream has so much to offer and it\'s definitely worth getting.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good, but needs work
reviews.comment: This app got me out of my body. It created a vacuum effect that was like a worm hole that my awareness followed out of my body. Pretty neat. but it was short lived because there is a routine choppy cut sound where the tracks seam is and it causes my awareness to jolt back into normal consciousness. Maybe its placed there to make us aware that we are dreaming, but I doubt it. Totally ruins a good trip for me. Please smooth out this sound glitch. Thx
reviews.author: randall marshall

reviews.title: Why?
reviews.comment: Clicks every minute or so and ruins the entire effect... don\'t buy until this gets fixed, useless.
reviews.author: jesse starr

reviews.title: Nice concept but failing to work
reviews.comment: Sounds are intermittent which would be fine if I was sure they were supposed to be or not but this app offers very little in the way of information. The night time one has to be reset daily.
reviews.author: Steven Watson

reviews.title: Sound blip
reviews.comment: Sound has small gaps periodically that jolt you out of any relaxation. As a result unusable for me.   Galaxy s3
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: isochronic too soft?
reviews.comment: The sound is too soft, when I use it without headphones. =/
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not worth paying for
reviews.comment: Audio skip is a serious problem!
reviews.author: Christina Ramey

reviews.title: App
reviews.comment: The app dont work at all on galaxy s2
reviews.author: anthony Lee dickinson

reviews.title: Best on the market
reviews.comment: It is just perfect! It would be really nice if you added flash dreamer function-then this app would be like best of the best ever in universe :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sick App
reviews.comment: Really awesome app. It\'s got a great amount of  features and does  exactly what I need it to.   Could you add the emotion  field  to the journal  page so we can track and even maybe eventually search by the emotions  we have during the night?    Also, can you make it so we can edit our dreams after saving? Tons of type o\'s in the night time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It isn\'t working.
reviews.comment: I paid the $1.49 and really like the simplicity of the app (though the options are a bit more complicated than people might think). However, it does not work for me and I am not sure if I\'m \"doing it right.\" I\'m not saying it doesn\'t work in the sense that it hasn\'t magically given me the ability to Lucid Dream. I don\'t expect that. I liked the idea of being reminded to do Reality Checks, so I set those up, and they don\'t happen. It only happens after I check off the Active checkbox and then I exit the app. I\'m not sure what I\'m doing wrong. I will test out the night alarms to see if those work, but having to sit there and wait for 4 hours to \"test\" to see if it works is kind of annoying. Anyway, I like the app. Just have yet to see/hear it work after I set it up. Maybe I need some help. Maybe this app does...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: This one works for me
reviews.comment: Would like to see more options for binaural, and would love to see an alpha option too. Other than that the best so far.
reviews.author: A Google User
